name: Distorting Lens
description:
Curled tendrils of Frost Grape vine hold droplets of rain, creating a lens which inverts the reflection of a large stand of Poplars.

The distortion of view is affected not only by the position in relation to a scene but also by the lens through which the moment is viewed.

2020. Nikon D60, 55-200mm Lens.

Photographed in situ, without the use of artificial lighting or staging. Photoshop only used for resizing.

1024x685 300dpi jpg
